title: Twit Publishing Presents PULP!: Winter/Spring 2011
description: Spine-tingling tales of suspense and terror! Prowl the exotic streets of Cairo's seedy underbelly in A Shot in the Dark, follow the haunting notes of the Balalaika to vampire-ridden Czarist Russia, and ride the western range with Montana Jack as he hunts for vengeance. Stroll the halls of Miskatonic University with The Interview, shiver from macabre horror of In the Bones, and spy upon the fantastic in the sword and sorcery yarn Whatever Happened to the Dark Lord?
author: Chris Gabrysch
